title: The Youth who wanted to shiver
creator_credit: Sam Weiss, C B Wismar, Nick Bosustow, Acton Films and Bosustow Entertainment

video_links.name: The Youth who wanted to shiver

brief_description: An animated adaptation of the classic fairy tale by the Brothers Grimm, about Jack who knows no fear and wants to be able to shiver. All help fails until his bride pours a bucket of tiny fish over him.
creator_credit_for_label: Sam Weiss, C B Wismar, Nick Bosustow, Acton Films and Bosustow Entertainment
